nodes.text: Tales of Nub Saar is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on April 8, 2004 and took the form of a documentary made by former Jedi trainee Dazen Mok on the destruction of the floating city Nub Saar. Mok hypothesized that the city was destroyed by a manifestation of the dark side of the Force contained within the gas giant Genarius.
